SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM sale_info s LEFT JOIN USER u ON s.sale_id=u.sale_id LEFT JOIN ordera o ON u.user_id=o.user_id LEFT JOIN sale_income si ON s.sale_id=si.sale_id
s.sale_id LIKE '%${saleId}%'
AND s.true_name LIKE '%${saleName}%'
AND s.phone LIKE '%${salePhone}%'
AND o.order_id LIKE '%${orderId}%'
AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),o.end_time) >= 7
AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),o.end_time) < 7
AND si.get_state = #{getState}
AND DATE_FORMAT(si.updated,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(si.updated,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY o.order_id ) AS a

SELECT s.sale_id, s.true_name AS sale_name, s.phone AS sale_phone, u.user_id, u.true_name AS user_name, u.phone AS user_phone, si.get_state, si.updated AS get_updated, si.get_money FROM sale_info s LEFT JOIN USER u ON s.sale_id = u.sale_id LEFT JOIN sale_income si ON s.sale_id =si.sale_id WHERE s.sale_id=#{saleId} AND u.user_id=#{userId} AND si.order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT oi.order_id, o.state AS order_state, o.updated AS sign_updated, oi.item_name, oi.itm_SKU, oi.price, oi.num, oi.total_fee, r.refund_money, id.commission FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN ordera o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN item_detail id ON oi.item_id=id.item_id LEFT JOIN refund r ON o.order_id=r.order_id WHERE o.user_id=#{userId} AND o.order_id=#{orderId} GROUP BY o.order_id
